description: Try our easy to follow Ginger Beer Battered Fish & Chips recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Fish & chips,Pescatarian,Fish,Soy free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Summer,Potato,Peanut free,Barramundi
name: Ginger Beer Battered Fish & Chips Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220Â°. Whisk flour, egg, salt and ginger beer together until smooth. Chill for 30 minutes.

Cut potatoes into wedges and steam for 5 minutes until just tender. Dry with paper towel. Spray a baking tray well with oil spray and arrange wedges in a single layer. Spray wedges with oil. Bake for 3040 minutes depending on thickness until golden and crisp.

Heat oil in a large pan over mediumhigh heat. Cut fish fillets into strips lengthways. Dust fish with extra flour. In batches, dip into batter to coat. Lower fish into hot oil and cook for 3-4 minutes until golden and cooked.
Serve fish and wedges with sour cream and sweet chilli sauce for the wedges.
